tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recognise professionalism when I see it. Indeed, the most gifted of the Doctors I have had the privilege to meet. Dr. Bajaj treated me as if I was a family member. He is a competent, thorough, compassionate and an excellent diagnostician with an intuitive understanding of his practice. He listened carefully to my medical history and prescribed me exactly what I needed. I followed up with him over email and he promptly answered each concern with sound advise and reassurance. I cannot recommend him more for any kind of ailment and cannot thank him enough for the care and attention to every detail that he gave me through the fortnight I was struggling to cope with the pandemic induced anxiety. He is a bright ray of sunshine across the Indian medical landscape ... Dr. Bajaj, I just want you to know how much you are appreciated, how incredible you are and how very much you bring to the community.

tags: None
review: Wonderful experience at  the clinic "AKSH".  The aura of the clinic is very positive and very well designed . Dr Shuchin Bajaj is a very experienced doctor with a holistic approach to health . Very humble, friendly and polite by nature ....as they say 'the very sight of the doctor cures half the problem' . He gives proper time and attention to the patient along with detailed information about the problem and its cure . Very effective and quick results. My experience was amazing . I would suggest all to visit and then I'm sure he'll be your doctor for a lifetime. Wish you more and more success.God bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** *** *** **** ****** ** **** ** **** ** ** ** *** **** ** ******** Dr. Shuchin's diagnosis is impeccable. He has the most calm n composed,friendly and understanding way of dealing with the patients,unlike many others. If you have even an iota of a problem,** **** **** *** **** ********* * *********** I am glad to have such a doctor treating to my health issues. I would highly recommend him to all those who r dealing with any medical issues. 
Thank you Dr. Shuchin Bajaj.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's always a pleasant experience to visit Dr.Shuchin as the way he talks to his patient and understand the root cause is just awesome. And ofcourse he follows very systematic and  digital approach.
One more thing I like about him is that he never believes in long term treatment..if things can be controlled with short term course, he prefers that and also wants patients to follow natural things like diet control, exercising.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What i like the most is the behaviour and attitude towards the patient, first he hear all the problem and then explain each and every possible way to cure. He gives you enough time to discuss about each and every aspect of your problem so that no part can be untouched.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

tags: None
review: Don't think doctor is concerned about your ailment felt he is in a hurry.. Consultation over in less than 10 seconds.. Even thought it was my second visit for exactly same problem doctor just prescribed the exact same meds as last time & told me to visit in 40 days
reply_text:
Hello Yash. It is unfortunate if you felt that way. Lets revisit the circumstances to help us in clearing this misunderstanding. I would be happy to see you again and explain at length as well if you want. You had visited for the first time on 27 December when a detailed neurological examination had been carried out and you had been advised some tests and asked to return in 10 days for a follow up visit. You returned after two months on 27 February, and without the tests that had been advised earlier. Although I would disagree with you that the consultation lasted for 10 seconds (it takes longer than that to take a pen and write your name on the prescription), it was certainly shorter than the previous consultation and you were advised to start the medicines again, get the required tests and return after 10 days (not 40). I will be happy to answer any other queries or doubts you may have on personal messages/calls or visits. My best regards to you. Get well soon.  I am totally committed to the care and well being if my patients and its very unusual for someone to say I see them in a rushed way. Usually my patients feel the consults are too long. ☺️ I would have been happy to have a long consult or call with you as well if you had only asked, instead of this. A Doctor Patient relationship is very special and I am not very comfortable going public with this entire issue, but I think this is how these modern times are. 
My best wishes to you for s healthy, happy and long life.
